verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
verses.transliteration: Hal ataa 'alal insaani heenum minad dahri lam yakun shai'am mazkooraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
verses.transliteration: Innaa khalaqnal insaana min nutfatin amshaajin nabta leehi faja'alnaahu samee'am baseeraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
verses.transliteration: Innaa hadainaahus sabeela immaa shaakiranw wa immaa kafoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
verses.transliteration: Innaaa a'tadnaa lilkaa fireena salaasila wa aghlaalanw wa sa'eeraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
verses.transliteration: innal abraara yashra boona min kaasin kaana mizaa juhaa kaafooraa

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
verses.transliteration: 'Aynany yashrabu bihaa 'ibaadul laahi yafajjiroonahaa tafjeeraa

verses.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
verses.transliteration: Yoofoona binnazri wa yakhaafoona yawman kaana sharruhoo mustateeraa

verses.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
verses.transliteration: Wa yut''imoonat ta'aama 'alaa hubbihee miskeenanw wa yatemanw wa aseeraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
verses.transliteration: Innaamaa nut'imukum li wajhil laahi laa nureedu minkum jazaaa'anw wa laa shukooraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
verses.transliteration: Innaa nakhaafu mir Rabbinna Yawman 'aboosan qamtareeraa

verses.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
verses.transliteration: Fa waqaahumul laahu sharra zaalikal yawmi wa laqqaahum nadratanw wa surooraa

words.translation: and will cause them to meet

verses.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
verses.transliteration: Wa jazaahum bimaa sabaroo janatanw wa hareeraa

verses.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
verses.transliteration: muttaki'eena feeha 'alal araaa 'iki laa yarawna feehaa shamsanw wa laa zamhareeraa

segments.arabic: لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
segments.translation: Not they will see therein sun and not freezing cold
segments.transliteration: lā yarawna fīhā shamsan walā zamharīran

verses.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
verses.transliteration: Wa daaniyatan 'alaihim zilaaluhaa wa zullilat qutoofu haa tazleela

verses.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.arabicSimple: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
verses.transliteration: Wa yutaafu 'alaihim bi aaniyatim min fiddatinw wa akwaabin kaanat qawaareeraa

verses.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
verses.transliteration: Qawaareera min fiddatin qaddaroohaa taqdeeraa

verses.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
verses.transliteration: Wa yusawna feehaa kaasan kaana mizaajuhaa zanjabeelaa

words.translation: And they will be given to drink

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
verses.transliteration: 'Aynan feeha tusammaa salsabeelaa

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
verses.transliteration: Wa yatoofu 'alaihim wildaanum mukhalladoona izaa ra aytahum hasibtahum lu'lu 'am mansoora

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
verses.transliteration: Wa izaa ra ayta summa ra ayta na'eemanw wa mulkan kabeera

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
verses.transliteration: 'Aaliyahum siyaabu sundusin khudrunw wa istabraq, wa hullooo asaawira min fiddatinw wa saqaahum Rabbuhum sharaaban tahooraa

segments.translation: Upon them will be garments of fine silk green and heavy brocade

segments.arabic: وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
segments.translation: And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver and will give them to drink their Lord a drink pure
segments.transliteration: waḥullū asāwira min fiḍḍatin wasaqāhum rabbuhum sharāban ṭahūran

words.translation: and will give them to drink

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
verses.transliteration: Innaa haazaa kaana lakum jazz 'anw wa kaana sa'yukum mashkooraa

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
verses.transliteration: Innaa nahnu nazzalnaa 'alaikal quraana tanzeelaa

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.arabicSimple: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
verses.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi Rabbika wa laa tuti' minhum aasiman aw kafooraa

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
verses.transliteration: Wazkuris ma Rabbika bukratanw wa aseelaa

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
verses.transliteration: Wa minal laili fasjud lahoo wa sabbihhu lailan taweelaa

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
verses.transliteration: Inna haaa'ulaa'i yuhibboona 'aajilata wa yazaroona waraaa'ahum yawman saqeelaa

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
verses.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnaahum wa shadadnaaa asrahum wa izaa shi'naa baddalnaaa amsaala hum tabdeelaa

segments.translation: We created them and We strengthened their forms
and when We will We can change their likeness[es] with a change

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.arabicSimple: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
verses.transliteration: Inna haazihee tazkiratun fa man shaaa'at takhaza ilaa rabbihee sabeela

segments.arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
segments.translation: so whoever wills let him take to his Lord a way
segments.transliteration: faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.arabicSimple: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
verses.transliteration: Wa maa tashaaa'oona illaa anyyashaaa'al laah; innal laahaa kaana'Aleeman Hakeema

segments.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ
segments.translation: And not you will except that wills Allah
segments.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa l-lahu

verses.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.arabicSimple: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
verses.transliteration: Yudkhilu mai yashaaa'u fee rahmatih; wazzaalimeena a'adda lahum 'azaaban aleemaa

segments.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy
but for the wrongdoers He has prepared for them a punishment painful
